feed.title: Macroecology Lab
feed.subtitle: We use statistical models and geospatial techniques to predict species’ ranges and their relationships with the environment, make estimates of biodiversity and map its patterns, and predict how biodiversity will change in the future.

entry.title: Hiromichi Suzuki receives JST Fellowship
entry.content: First-year doctoral student Hiromichi Suzuki received a JST Pioneering Research Support Project fellowship, which will support him throughout his graduate research. Congratulations!

entry.title: Megan Low receives ASEAN Foundation Scholarship

link.title: Megan Low receives ASEAN Foundation Scholarship

entry.content: First-year master’s student Megan Low received the ASEAN Scholarship, a prestigious award from the ASEAN Foundation that provides her with monthly support during her graduate education. Congratulations!

entry.title: Welcome Hanami party
entry.content: We had a Hanami party for our new lab members at Nishi Park in downtown Sendai. Hanami is an outdoor party where everyone can enjoy blooming cherry blossoms, snacks, and drinks together.
